healing energies from the earth

item.arbiters_seal.shields.thunder_shiel:
A glowing gold shield that
turns lightning into healing
energy.
item.arbiters_seal.shields.teorite_shiel:
A shield made of teorite,
powerful against all forms of
attacks.
A blessed shield that is
particularly strong against
magical attacks.
item.arbiters_seal.shields.arbiter_shiel:
A spiked shield that also
protects against many forms of
injuries.
A small buckler intended for
wizards, to help with their 
offensive magic.
item.arbiters_seal.shields.valiant_shiel:
A very light shield used to
deflect blows rather than to
block them.
item.arbiters_seal.shields.behemoth_guar:
merely holding it makes one stronger.
The shield of a legendary giant:
item.arbiters_seal.shields.cursed_shield:
Only battle can appease the
curse on this shield.
item.arbiters_seal.shields.shield_of_the:
A shield with unfathomable
defensive power.
item.arbiters_seal.spears.boar_spear.too:
A broad-bladed hunting spear
to bring down big game.
item.arbiters_seal.spears.silver_spear.t:
A spear decorated with silver
filigree.
item.arbiters_seal.spears.icespike.toolt:
A pike infused with the bite of
arctic winds.
item.arbiters_seal.spears.flamespike.too:
A pike consumed with the
hunger of a raging fire.
item.arbiters_seal.spears.stonespike.too:
A pike that can cause the very
earth to quake.
item.arbiters_seal.spears.boltspike.tool:
A pike endowed with the fury
of a lightning storm.
A teorite spear to pierce
through baneful hexes.
item.arbiters_seal.spears.partisan.toolt:
A spear with defensive
protrusions to aid in parrying.
item.arbiters_seal.spears.heavy_lance.to:
An oversized lance for
ceremonial and intimidation
purposes.
item.arbiters_seal.spears.godray.tooltip:
An awe-inspiring weapon that
makes its wielder steadfast.
item.arbiters_seal.staffs.white_staff.to:
A staff carved out of pure
alabaster, blessed by a very
vocal priest.
item.arbiters_seal.staffs.silver_staff.t:
A straight staff with a silver
headpiece.
A staff that heals wounds with
a mere touch.
A staff forged out of teorite to
manipulate magical forces.
item.arbiters_seal.staffs.gold_staff.too:
A gaudy staff with golden
decorations.
item.arbiters_seal.staffs.black_staff.to:
A charred wood staff of
unknown origin.
item.arbiters_seal.staffs.gatekeeper.too:
The staff of office of the
warden of the underworld.
item.arbiters_seal.staffs.godsleg.toolti:
Carved out of the femur of a
forgotten god.
item.arbiters_seal.swords.longsword.tool: A blade for a valorous knight.
item.arbiters_seal.swords.silver_sword.t:
A ceremonial sword blessed by
a venerable priest
A gruesome weapon capable of
inflicting horrific wounds.
Forged from the purest teorite,
sharp enough to slice spells
apart.
item.arbiters_seal.swords.icebrand.toolt:
A blade quenched in the coldest
currents of the ocean.
item.arbiters_seal.swords.flamebrand.too:
A sword forged in the heat of a
volcano.
item.arbiters_seal.swords.stonebrand.too:
A sword honed on the hardest
of diamonds.
item.arbiters_seal.swords.boltbrand.tool:
A lightning bolt hammered into
the shape of a sword.
item.arbiters_seal.swords.enhancer.toolt:
An oversized athame to help
focus magical powers.
item.arbiters_seal.swords.ebony_sword.to:
A sword as black as night to
tame the darkness.
item.arbiters_seal.swords.dendrite_sword:
A crystalline blade that
dissipates holy magic.
Its eerie whistling keeps its
user awake at night.
item.arbiters_seal.swords.excalibur.tool:
The holiest of swords will heal
all wounds over time.
item.arbiters_seal.swords.soul_eater.too:
A diabolical weapon that feeds
its wielder's lust for power.
item.arbiters_seal.swords.guardian_sword:
A weapon covered in protective
runes.
item.arbiters_seal.swords.eternias.toolt:
The strongest, deadliest of all
swords.
item.arbiters_seal.trinkets.amethyst_ear:
These amethyst earrings ward
off all ailments.
item.arbiters_seal.trinkets.ancient_lock:
An ancient family heirloom.
Anyone wearing it swears they
can hear soft whispers from it.
item.arbiters_seal.trinkets.battle_locke:
An amulet to enhance combat
abilities.
item.arbiters_seal.trinkets.clarity_band:
A sunset-colored ring, to calm
emotions.
item.arbiters_seal.trinkets.energy_locke:
A pendant charged with
magical power.
item.arbiters_seal.trinkets.glasses.tool:
A simple pair of glasses. They
let the wearer see things better.
item.arbiters_seal.trinkets.mirror_locke:
A carcanet which protects from
curses and hexes.
item.arbiters_seal.trinkets.oath_band.to:
A topaz ring, to reinforce
loyalty.
item.arbiters_seal.trinkets.phoenix_band:
A signet in the shape of the
eternal phoenix bird.
item.arbiters_seal.trinkets.power_locket:
An amulet that converts speed
to raw power.
item.arbiters_seal.trinkets.pure_band.to:
A kale-green ring, to help
eliminate toxins.
item.arbiters_seal.trinkets.ruby_earring:
These ruby earrings protects
from exotic maladies.
item.arbiters_seal.trinkets.sapphire_ear:
These sapphire earrings protects
against many common
ailments.
item.arbiters_seal.trinkets.shining_band:
A glowing ring to help with
vision troubles.
item.arbiters_seal.trinkets.vigil_band.t: A garnet ring, to keep one alert.
item.arbiters_seal.trinkets.zephyr_locke:
A pendant that grants the
wearer the swiftness of the
wind.
